title: $2,300 / 3br - Lakeside 3-Bedroom Apartment with a Large Sunny Kitchen
posting_body: ['Description:', "This spacious top floor duplex unit is located within a stone's throw away from Oakland's beautiful Lake Merritt.", 'Ideally situated between I-880 and I-580 in the Merritt neighborhood of Oakland, you can enjoy the best that Oakland has to offer in local dining, outdoor events, art & culture; all of which are within minutes from your doorstep.', 'WALK SCORE ®', "Walker's Paradise (92)", 'TRANSIT SCORE ®', "Rider's Paradise (72)", 'BIKE SCORE ®', "Biker's Paradise (94)", 'The apartment has a fresh coat of paint and is ready for occupancy.', 'Tile flooring in the bathroom and kitchen, and recently shampooed carpeted floors throughout the unit.', 'The open kitchen/dining room layout has tons of natural light and comes with granite counter tops, new appliances (fridge, gas stove/oven combo, water heater)', 'Gated front entry with access to a shared side and front yard.', 'Utilities:', 'Owner pays for Garbage only.', 'Tenants are responsible for water and PG&E', 'Requirements:', 'A minimum credit score of 670 is required (No delinquency, collection, evictions or other negative remarks).', 'Minimum Net monthly income is 2.5x', 'No Pets/No Smoking or Drugs', '1 year lease', '$40 application fee for each applicant 18 years and older.', 'Email to setup an appointment for showing (Masks required)']
